biotools.summary: MRAID(Mendelian Randomization with Automated Instrument Determination),is an R package for efficient statistical inference of two-sample Mendelian Randomization. MRAID takes GWAS summary statistics as inputs to estimate causal effects of one trait on another.

bioschemas.name: MRAID
bioschemas.summary: MRAID(Mendelian Randomization with Automated Instrument Determination),is an R package for efficient statistical inference of two-sample Mendelian Randomization. MRAID takes GWAS summary statistics as inputs to estimate causal effects of one trait on another.
